Key Match Events: New Zealand bundled out Sri Lanka for 102
Trent Boult returned figures of 4 for 13
Mitchell Santner and Ish Sodhi scalped two wickets each
Pre-Game Insights: Kane Williamson won the toss and opted to bat first
Post-Match Reflections: Glenn Phillips is the Player of the Match
Kane Williamson says that it was an interesting game and the wicket was very different from what he expected
Dasun Shanaka says that they started really well, especially in the first 10 overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand remain unbeaten and build a lead at the top of the Group 1 points table
